name: Timbuk2 Especial Stash
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description: Get to work or school with piece of mind, knowing your stuff will stay dry even if it starts to rain. This sleek, weather-resistant messenger bag can be worn over either shoulder. The subtle reflective hits keep you safe at dawn and dusk.Weather-resistant fabric keeps contents dry.Ambidextrous shoulder strap carries easily on either side. Quick release buckle for easy transitions from bike to pavementSide stretch pocket holds a bottle or U lock.Magnetic closure snaps securely shut.Waterproof laptop sleeve.Reflective bottom panel keeps you visible in low light.
